long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select a pre-made call-to-action (or add and save your own), and pair it with any links you want to add and save. Now you can quickly grab a CTA + link and inject them into content such as social media posts, emails, blogs, and much more.
